name: IGLOO: A Snowy Season
description:
Platform through the temple, find the artifacts.. Melt them! and add them to your collection!

This version of the game was made for the UNREAL SPRING JAM 2020

Modifier CATEGORY: Solo Developer (Army of One)

All music is original.  All models are original.

All assets (besides the ones bellow) were made within the Unreal Spring Jam 2020 time period. 

Used Asset Packs - 

Good sky: for the skysphere

Chameleon Post Process: for Post process

Entire Game developed by Faith254. 

Team - 

Faith254 (me) 

Gameplay Instructions
WASD - Standard Movement
Left Mouse Key - Melt Ice
Space Bar - Jump & Double Jump
